          <title>
            <string language="en">Evidence for the phlogiston theory</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beweis für die phlogiston Theorie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Évidence pour la théorie de phlogiston</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Evidência para a teoria do phlogiston</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prova per la teoria del phlogiston</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στοιχεία για τη θεωρία phlogiston</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Evidencia para la teoría del phlogiston</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of a series of four illustrations showing the loss of phlogiston in smelting of ores and charcoals.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">phlogiston</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">phlogiston theory</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">smelting</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weight</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von einer Reihe von vier Abbildungen, die 
den Verlust von phlogiston im Einschmelzen der Erze und der Holzkohlen
zeigen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord d'une série de quatre illustrations 
montrant la perte de phlogiston dans la fonte des minerais et des 
charbons de bois.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de uma série de quatro 
ilustrações que mostram a perda do phlogiston no smelting dos 
minérios e dos carvões de lenha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di una serie di quattro 
illustrazioni che mostrano la perdita di phlogiston nella fusione dei 
minerali e dei carboni di legna.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα μιας σειράς τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που 
εμφανίζουν την απώλεια phlogiston στον οσμηρό των μεταλλευμάτων
και των ξυλανθράκων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de una serie de cuatro ilustraciones que 
muestran la pérdida de phlogiston en la fundición de minerales y de 
carbones de leña.</string>
          </description>
